attributes.action: If 1st Choice:People's Vote, ignored then 2nd Choice:UK holds EU Parl Elections
attributes.additional_details:
1) Public speeches frm Mr Tusk &Mrs May 21 Mar 19
2) 1st Choice: Parliament Petition to Revoke Art 50
3) Loss of Charter of Human Rights after Brexit where the people lose, inter alia, any right to a democratic and fair process. 
4) Only SOME UK legislation has been transposed & many Statutory Instruments had NO impact assessment carried out against our human rights eg The Environmental Protection (Amend)(NI) (EU Exit) Regulations 2019. 
More time=due diligence
5) Time 4 setting up NI EPA & MMO
attributes.background:
Mr Tusk indicated that w/out any UK representation in the EU Parl there is no future for the UK in the EU. If, however, the UK hold EU Parl elections, we will be afforded a long term extension without a deadline. 
We need this time to make the right decision, the right way, by the right people:RA50

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

If you would like a referendum on EU membership you could sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235138

If you would like European Parliament elections to be held you could sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/243613
